reviews.title: Super soft and durable
reviews.review_text: This rug should be used for a low traffic area due to the color I selected but I have it in a living room and it s holding up better then expected. It's soft and the color is exactly what I wanted. It cleans up well with a vacuum cleaner and the shag stays plush

reviews.title: Great rug
reviews.review_text: It doesn't lay flat when you immediately take it out of the box, however I've only had it for 24 hours and the rug is laying out properly now. It says to give it 72 hours to fully straighten out. It's beautiful and very soft. I like it, but I will have to see how it does with getting vacuumed in a few days.

reviews.title: I love this rug!!!
reviews.review_text: If you are wanting a great quality rug, this is the one for you. I thought this rug was going to be a cheap rug. I was surprised by the quality and price. I'm tempted to buy another. It feels so so so soooo good. I bought the black. I'm going to buy another one in a different color.

i bought this rug for my granddaughters room. she absolutely loves it. It fits just right beside her bed. It is so soft and fluff, it feels so good to walk on. It is easy to vacuum and keep clean. i would recommend buying as I will be for my next room makeover.

reviews.title: Meh
reviews.review_text: I received the dark grey instead of light grey but it was ok. It's not as “shaggy” as photo because the pile is a lot softer. It's a little slick since it's so soft. I got what I paid for, which is what I expected so with that in mind, if you don't want anything of quality and it's only going to be around for a little while, it's good.

reviews.title: Nice Rug, Change the Vacuum Seal Shipping
reviews.review_text: I really do like this rug. The shipping needs to be changed as the vacuum seal is not a good idea. I have ordered 3 times returning 1 already and i will give my recent order another couple days to snap back. If it doesn't , i will return and order again until i get a 2nd good one. One is perfect so I know it can happen. I need 2 of them side by side. Not sure about recommending as it takes lots of patience to wait several days on the recovery….if it does.

I was sent the wrong rugs, I order shage and i was sent something furry like,it has the right order number but send a different rugs, I really don't like them, but i have no way to bring them to you. please inform the company of this mistake. Thanks

reviews.title: Very unsatisfied
reviews.review_text: I ordered two of these and let them lay flat for 72 hours and they still do not lay flat , I have a two year-old and a nine-year-old and the rugs will actually cause you to file where they do not lie right it's very disappointing.. I have put a picture of both rugs on here.

reviews.title: waste of money
reviews.review_text: the rug came vacuumed sealed which is fine..but it's a week later and it still won't lay flat and is just a waste of money. it looks like waves on an ocean! I laid it flat and got all the wrinkles out just like the instructions said and it's still awful!

reviews.title: Delivery sucks
reviews.review_text: I bought a smaller one before loved it. Ordered the bigger one and it never showed, was delayed, then supposedly delivered at 9:11 pm. with a photo of the road. no resolution yet as they figure out what happened. No product or refund. Just want what was ordered.

reviews.title: Perfect pink, great on hardwood floor.
reviews.review_text: I got the 9x12 foot pink shag rug for my granddaughters bedroom. The pink is a beautiful color. She has hardwood floors and we wanted to add color and softness. This is perfect. Perfect lightweight yet not to flimsy. pretty well made, nice soft backing and perfect shag length. For the price you can't go wrong. Once my grandsons wood flooring is installed will be buying another one for his room.

there are reviews referring to this as just a fury blanket. That's true, somewhat. A blanket with a thick non-slip side. however given the price and the super soft texture, this rug is totally worth it. If it was as thick as an ordinary rug it would be far too heavy to move around. Being lighter weight it's perfect for a soft warm layer between you and the floor. We use this rug on top of a carpet. It adds a super cozy feel to the room and layers of texture. we love it!

reviews.title: Color is not the same as pictured and ordered
reviews.review_text: I bought this rug specifically for the color. The color is way off. The “directions” that came with it said that it would basically fluff out and change colors over time. It hasn't changed colors at all. It totally clashes with the bedding.

reviews.title: Folds in rug never flattened.
reviews.review_text: Rug was folded on delivery and the folds never flattened. It has been 2 months since purchase and the bumps are still in the rug. Yes we followed the included instructions on how to let it settle, it did not work!

I've ordered rugs previously through Walmart, this is the worst one yet. color, good. size, good. but it will not lay down. it's a bunch of squares on my floor. cannot even vacuum the rug if i need to. Hopefully it will eventually lay down!

reviews.title: So Disappointed
reviews.review_text: Let's just say I ordered an area rug and got a bedspread. I returned it right back the same day, to my local Walmart with no problems. If you read this, save yourself the trouble and don't order it.

reviews.title: won't flatten
reviews.review_text: this rug was folded and packed very tightly. The instructions said to leave it open and walk around on it for 3 days to let the creases come out. after about a week I gave up and returned it. It wouldn't flatten. It was all wavy and curled up.

reviews.title: Nefoso Shag Area Rug
reviews.review_text: This area rug is absolutely beatufil on the floor it made my living room light up and it feels very soft to your feet. Looks amazing in my living room. I was exited to open it and put it on my floor.

reviews.title: Nice rug
reviews.review_text: It is soft and fluffy. The back has good stickiness. It was better quality than I expected, it's vacuum sealed so you have to let it revive a bit, but mine was fine all the wrinkles came out and it feels like there is foam in it.

reviews.title: Super thin but soft
reviews.review_text: This is super thin so provides no cushion whatsoever, but does feel super soft on your feet. Be careful with socks on and walking on it you will slip and fall because it's slippery.
It takes 4 for my dog a day this item doesn't last two weeks becouse it takes so many a day for a 65 pound dog I'll be spending more money just for a month supply for my dog Not worth buying again

reviews.title: Color, plushness is spot on!
reviews.review_text: Very pleased; everything was a stated. Nicely vacuum packed, easy to unfold and allow any creases to disappear. If I should desire another area carpet, I'll definitely consider buying another one like this.

Th the rug is beautiful. I had to return it because it was too large for the area that I needed it for beautiful color. the rug is beautiful. I had to return it because it was too large for the area that I needed it for beautiful color.
what kind of sweeper you suppose to use for this shag carpet i have a Shark you cant hardly push the sweeper so heavy i tried it on sweeper. disappointed

reviews.title: DISGUSTING
reviews.review_text: Should not even be able to have one star carpet came with balls of cockroaches and ticks and bugs nests I had to fumigation my entire apartment and vacate the property Smells like poison

reviews.title: Good
reviews.review_text: Really good quality! It only took 24 hrs to get rid of the creases and it feels so soft! It does shed to I have to vacuum it more but other than that it's a good carpet.

reviews.title: Huge rug GREAT PRICE
reviews.review_text: Huge rug at a great price completely covered my entire room. VERY SOFT!!! It dose seem like it will be a hassle to clean though but with the proper equipment should be fine!!
Its a wonderful rug. It is very soft and well made. It is a great value. However, beware that the camel color has more of a orange tint to it than appears in the computer swatch.

This rug won't lay flat. It stays bunched up and so I can't use it bc ppl will trip. If it had been rolled instead of folded into a small square, this issue might have been avoided. I've tried everything to get it to lay flat with no success.

reviews.title: Fluffy, soft cloud!!
reviews.review_text: This fluffy, soft rug was a gift. It looks just like the online pic. It is oh, so soft and fluffy!! It is true to size and color. I absolutely love it!!!
The rug is huge I love it, it's so soft omg I love it and it covered almost my whole bedroom floor this is a must get , this is a must have 10 out of 10

reviews.title: Awesome rug! Buy it!
reviews.review_text: This is an awesome rug! Comes vacuum sealed, so a little deceiving. But once it's out, a couple days later it is so nice looking, soft, and awesome! You won't be disappointed!

This was nice looking but once laid down, it was full of little pebbles. they were like small piece of stone almost like fine gravel. very hard on vacuum cleaner. flattened very quickly after walking on it a while.

I got it for my 6 month old so when he's rolling around it's more soft for him, he absolutely loves it, I was worried about it being slippery since a lot of reviews said it was but I haven't had any slipping issues, it folded out super easy, the size is perfect for what I needed. Vacuuming is super easy!

reviews.title: Very soft and a great value
reviews.review_text: This rug is a fantastic option if you're looking for something soft and stylish without breaking the bank. It's a bit thinner than some other rugs, but that doesn't detract from its comfort. It feels wonderful under your feet. Overall, I'm extremely pleased with this purchase.

reviews.title: Great rug
reviews.review_text: very soft, stays put very well doesnt lift or move. i did get this for my bedroom which isn't very high traffic compared to a living room but its holding up well. no weird smell, easy to set up. i did notice its very soft which can be a little slippery but again im using this for the bedroom. i personally wouldnt use this for a living room but its great for playroom and bedrooms.

reviews.title: Quality Bargain
reviews.review_text: Rich looking shag, soft silky feeling, grey color is medium dark and pretty. Rug as described on line. This is second purchase for a different size, no shedding after 3 weeks, vacuums well. Padding underneath recommended.. Submitted by TELLIT

reviews.title: Light Gray shag 8x10
reviews.review_text: I bought this rug solely because of the price for the size and for that I give it 4 stars. It came rolled up in a tiny box so I knew right away it was going to be thin, however the fullness of the shag surprised me. The rug is very very soft. Almost too soft so it's a little slippery! I wanted a rug to keep my Modular sectional in place but the prices still slide! But the kids love it! Some other reviews mentioned the color and it is more on the blue/silver side of gray, but that actually worked for us. Overall and for the value, I'd recommend this!

It looks like a rag it's not soft at all. It's a very thin rug and there's two pieces in the box and I don't know why I didn't even open the rug all the way, but this will be returned. It looks like a rag it's not soft at all. It's a very thin rug and there's two pieces in the box and I don't know why I didn't even open the Royal all the way, but this will be returned.

reviews.title: AWFUL!
reviews.review_text: This rug is made out of some sort of synthetic, nylon, CHEAP Muppet material. you absolutely cannot vacuum it with anything, and it's too big to put in the washing machine. (extra large front loader) it's a one and done. you're unable to clean it in any way shape or form, so if your house is like mine.. full of dogs and kids, cleaning is mandatory.

reviews.title: My feet like it
reviews.review_text: It's ok for the price I paid. I am disappointed in the cushion underneath it's not real consistent throughout the whole rug. It's fairly easily to maintain as long as you stay on top of it. Imagine it's like hair lol so things can get tangled in it very easily.
I love that it's soft I needed something large because I have hardwood floors and a 1-year-old that loves to move around. as soon as I put it down she started crawling.

reviews.title: Thick and fluffy
reviews.review_text: I am really enjoying my new carpet. It's so soft thick and fluffy. The floor looks really nice with the new grey carpet. My granddaughter really loves crawling on it.

reviews.title: SO SOFT
reviews.review_text: great rug, super soft, nice cushion. Really pleased. only “flaw” would be that the color when it arrived is a bit peachier than pure camel/caramel color. but for the price i said f it and ive lived using it every day, definitely would recommend.

reviews.title: Stuff gets stuck!!!
reviews.review_text: Better than I expected! The rug is very hard to remove trash or food. It gets stuck in the rug and you can't sweep or vacuum it out! It has to be hand picked out! So it's hard work to clean it!!!
The rug has been laying on the floor for 2 weeks and it's still a wrinkled mess. It's so soft, and the color was good I hate that I can't use it. There's no way to return it.

These rugs were exactly what I was looking for. They have great grip, great quality, %26 great price. The only thing I would mention is that they are so soft they are almost slick. So be careful in your socks
This rug is wirth the money. I shampooed it with my electric shampooer and it cleaned up great. Layed it out on my banisters to dry and it dried well and fluffy.

reviews.title: Smells
reviews.review_text: This rug smells awful. The best I can describe the smell is a mix of paint and car urine. I bought a larger version of the same rug and it did not smell.

I wouldn't know because I never received it. The rug along with a set of headphones were shipped together. It took weeks for them to ship and when I received a message that they had arrived, they had not. The shipping company tracked the package and said it should have delivered. Total waste of money. I'll only order from Amazon in the future.

reviews.title: So soft!
reviews.review_text: So I was hesitant to purchase due to the other reviews, but the quality of the rug is actually great for the price. It is so cozy for a hardwood floor as it keeps my feet warm when I wake up in the morning instead of touching a cold floor. The colors of the rug is true to sight, BLACK! Like blackity black. I have vacuum over it once and did not find any shedding, so I was grateful for that. It's a great bedroom rug and I may purchase one for the living room.

reviews.title: Such a bargain. Light weight n fluffy
reviews.review_text: So nice. Light weight n fluffy i use my leaf blower puff it. Its not the heavy rug u see for sale for rooms this is light weight n i love it sorry for the bad pict we just moved in n needed something in the living room as it is hardwood floors and we needed something inexpensive and easy to move

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.review_text: I loved this carpet. My dog loves it too! She usually goes to the bathroom on the carpet during to anxiety when we are gone. She loves the carpet so much she hasn't has anxiety she just rolls on it and sleeps. The only thing that was wrong is , its very hard to vacuum

No too thick just enough cushion under my feet and is so soft to touch, I did accidentally spill water the first day I got it but I was able to blot it dry very quickly, and it wasn't soaked. My son who has sensory issues loves how cozy it feels, and there is no shedding.

reviews.title: Nefoso Shag Area Rug 8' x 10' Soft Fluffy Area Rug
reviews.review_text: I had small (really small) area rugs in the living room. It is also a cold room. The 8'x10' rug covered a large bare area in the room, and the small, small area rugs were placed on top of the newcomer. The gray color complimented the area rugs and the furniture. Easy to unwrap and lay down, about 5 minutes.

reviews.title: Not a quality rug. Headache from toxic smell.
reviews.review_text: I knew when the package arrived and the rug was shrink wrapped I shouldn't even bother opening it but I did because of so many positive reviews. You can't even call this a rug. It's is a piece of useless, smelly piece of garbage. Will be returning this thing. It's horrible.

reviews.title: Very disappointed
reviews.review_text: They advertise it as shag rug,but it actually a fauxe fir rug. It's very,very thin and super slippery. My teenage grand child has fallen twice on it. I do not recommend this product to anyone unless you want a fauxe fir product. Shedds when vacuumed also. This is a poor quality area rug.

reviews.title: Still Undecided??
reviews.review_text: The size and color of the rug is great. The prize is amazing. The rug is very soft. But the texture of the rug is hard to explain. Its very slippery. It reminds me of a bath matt. My cats love it! But Im still undecided. It doesn't feel like a real rug .... I guess for the price I'll keep it.

reviews.title: highly recommend! great for any room!
reviews.review_text: I ordered 2 of the 8 x 10 rugs; a black one for my sons room, and a pink one for my toddlers room. they are so soft and comfy and really pull the rooms together! I did wait for them to go on sale so I did get them for around $50 a piece so that was a great deal to me!

reviews.title: Not good for toddlers
reviews.review_text: I bought this because my grandson just started walking, and i thought it would give some extra padding to the hard wood floor. I waited 72 hours, as suggested, for it to "plump up" and i still never felt one bit of memory foam in this rug. it made the floor much more slippery, and easier for him to trip. Very bad idea for babies learning to walk . Very thin, and slippery.

I ordered this to lay down on my cement basement floor. I didn't want to spend a lot of money but still wanted a rug comfortable to walk on. This rug is great! It's thin but not too thin. Its soft and feels nice on bare feet. I liked it so well I bought another! Great value!

reviews.title: Great deal!
reviews.review_text: I ordered 2 sizes of this rug, 8 x 10 %26 5 x8. I was surprised and concerned that they were sent in a very small box. I decided to open the smaller rug first and would just return both if I didn't like it. It came in a vacuum sealed bag that instantly expands upon opening. The instructions said to lay it flat for 3 days. I did and it was fine and very soft. I was nervous it would shed but it didn't. The backing was soft rubber like a bath mat so I had concerns that it would pull up when being vacuumed. Nope. Both rugs were for our odd shaped bedroom with the larger going under our bed. I had intended to lay it vertically with the long side going from top of the bed to the bottom. Once we felt how nice and soft the fur was, we decided to lay it the short way to allow a larger amount to step on getting out of the bed. Truly impressed and believe me I tried to find fault.

reviews.title: 4 stars!
reviews.review_text: Love the rug. Great price, less than $40 for a very large rug. Be aware it takes a day or two to completely flatten. The kids never want to relax on the couch anymore. It's so soft and comfortable. It doesn't vacuum easily. The high pile gets wrapped around the vacuum brushes. I don't mind this because I can detach the head. Love the rug!

The rug comes in folded. Instruction sheet said it takes 3 days (72 hours) to get flat. But rug is wavy on the edge and the folding mark appeared bulgy and misformed due to the extracted air press for easy transportation. Not a great shaped rug! I am disappointed.

reviews.title: Soft, Plush and Gorgeous
reviews.review_text: The carpet is very soft, the color is perfect, true to size and easy to lay, you just have to let it settle for a couple of days and have patience, it will flatten out. The bottom has a rubbery texture which gives it a good fit and keeps it in place.

reviews.title: Soft but not a rug
reviews.review_text: I wanted a plain black rug to put under my bed and spread out into the length of my bedroom. This is not a rug as you think of a rug. It's very soft but, it's more like a big throw that you would put on your couch or bed. There's no padding or structure to the "rug" just a very soft fabric to try to control. I say that because the fabric doesn't want to spread smoothly. It's not a rug, it's a very soft spread. I wanted to return it but it was more trouble to get it out from under my bedframe and than into a vacum bag and fitting into a box. No, I kept it and I'm careful not to trip over the big ripples and waves in the fabric.

reviews.title: Great Rug for the Price!
reviews.review_text: Great shag rug for the price! Bought the 8x10 and the 9x12 to cover up some old carpet and it looks cute, very soft, the pets love it too. It's pretty thin, but the padding would be comfortable on a hard floor also. We'll see how well it holds up in a high traffic area, but i think it would be absolutely perfect in a bedroom.

reviews.title: Great ride for the great price
reviews.review_text: I seriously did not expect much due to the price of this rug. I bought it for my great room and my dogs. It is so cute and they absolutely love it. I would've paid $50 for this rug. It is thin, but the shag of the carpet makes it look worth more than it actually is.

reviews.title: Don't waste your money
reviews.review_text: Does not sit well. Slides all over the place when you walk on it. Padding is thin so it feels like you're still walking on a hard floor. This thing keeps wrinkling and folding up every time it's stepped on. Read the reviews here so I decided to purchase based on reviews. They're lying. If you want the truth, this is it right here. It's not worth the money.

reviews.title: A Shot in the Dark Proved to be Disappointing
reviews.review_text: The rug came with a long dirty 3-foot line below the rug fibers. The fibers themselves stuck wildly to my husband's pants when he kneeled on the rug to feel how thin was the padding beneath the top fur layer. The fibers came up in clumps of fur and tangled fibers! I was utterly disappointed. We cannot use or keep this rug. Our previous rug cost far less and offered unbeatable quality, bounce and durability. That is what I thought I was getting. Alas, it's not even 24 hours since it arrived. It's got a roundtrip ticket to WalMartville. Bye bye baby. Sorry you weren't what I was expecting. But the pink fur was pretty to look at. That's all.
This rug is awesome.. So soft and had zero issues getting it to lay flat once out of the package. Highly recommend

reviews.title: Priceless
reviews.review_text: Very nice addition to my living room and is very comfortable to walk on barefoot. The grandkids like to sit on the floor now.
with time the material gets ugly, the hairs of it become more tangled and looks ugly, . . does the job, it was beautiful when it arrived
Great rug, fluffy, but a bit slippery feel to it. I'm an elder so for safety reasons it's not for me.

reviews.title: Wrong Size
reviews.review_text: Nice Carpet. But sent me a 7x9 instead of a 8x10 like I ordered. I have it all laying out now. I'm not returning it now.

reviews.title: Shag carpet in
reviews.review_text: Love the texture and cool feeling of this carpet, it goes well with my bedroom and the dogs love it too

reviews.title: Quality Rug
reviews.review_text: The quality of the rug was nice. The color was the perfect the size was perfect for me it definitely was a great price
Looks just like picture. Strange synthetic material. Had bad smell. Had to put rug outside in sun with deodorizer to air out

reviews.title: Waste of money
reviews.review_text: It's a CHEAP rug. But it's also a throw away , it shows wear immediately and gets “tangled”. Vacuum doesn't help.

reviews.title: Great buy!
reviews.review_text: very soft and fluffy with a plush, cushion like step when walking on it. Color is spot on and matched in the room perfectly. I love it

reviews.title: You will enjoy!
reviews.review_text: plush and comfortable. high quality fabric. The texture of this rugs feels great on my feet. very durable and easy to clean so far.
It's a very cool looking rug and feels great to walk on. It is very large. It shed. But only for a couple days and it's fine now.

reviews.title: value for your buck!
reviews.review_text: The product is very plush and feels quite nice walking on it.Thickness is really good.. Great value for your buck.

reviews.title: Makes my room look much cuter
reviews.review_text: i got this carpet on sale and i'm very satisfied with the quality, within 24 hours it got super soft, and it's very comfortable to walk on and lay on

reviews.title: Perfect!
reviews.review_text: I bought two of these in the cream, it definitely has a color, not just off white, so they are perfect for my home!
I bought 2 and Ive had the rugs opn for a week and their still bunched up. Should be fully opn after 72 hours. I wouldn't recommend

reviews.title: Best item I've bought all year
reviews.review_text: oh I can't because it the size it said it would be and it's very very soft to not stiff like a regular room size rug/carpet
Waited 3 weeks and never even received the product. Finally got a refund from Walmart after the third week..

reviews.title: Just OK
reviews.review_text: It's decent, but very slippery (if you're walking in socks you slide all around) and it sheds like mad! We have huge balls of shag tumbling throughout our house like tumbleweed from this rug.

reviews.title: Comfy, fluffy carpet.
reviews.review_text: Carpet is very soft and comfy. Everyone loves to lay on it . It is very fluffy! Young nephew loves to slide across it in his socks! Would highly recommend it! Might be buying another one for our bedroom.
i liked the softness of the rug but i dont see it lasting very long. its very thin and easily moves and the corners fold too easily. This definitely wont be used as a long term rug.

reviews.title: Recommend 100%
reviews.review_text: Wow the size is great at this price! Full 8by 10 ft. Huge! So soft and cushioned. We all want to sleep on the floor. I would definitely purchase again.

reviews.title: Don't buy this rug.
reviews.review_text: This rug was attractive, but it's super slippery. I was so afraid that I was going to slip and fall, that I returned it. I would not recommend purchasing it.
Well made. Beautiful color. Works perfect with an anti slip pad. The color works with a wide variety of colors. I have it in my bedroom. You also can't beat the price.

This does not even feel like a actual rule and look like a throat. They put a cover on the back. This is not what I expected and yes, I am going to return this. This will not lay on the floor and stay.

reviews.title: Much more beautiful than expected
reviews.review_text: I will be purchasing more. this carpet/rug is much more beautiful and full of comfort than I truly expected. My bones are very sensitive and fragile, walking and sitting on top of the rug brings so much comfort. the color is amazing.

reviews.title: Better than expected!
reviews.review_text: The padding under the carpet is cushy and way better than I anticipated! The “fluffy” texture is loved by our toddler. Not sure how it will hold up with minimal foot traffic (bedroom rug) and how much dog hair will stick.
so soft and vacuums up very nicely! has nice padding. love that it come folded and vacuumed sealed and not rolled up where you have to wait for the corners to lay!
I purchased the same rug, but a different color in this rug is not the same texture or feel. It's very hard to walk across. I'm just not happy at all.
Very lumpy. You can't vacuum or wash it. I will NEVER get another one. The color was supposed to be white but I received a beige. It also gets flat too fast. Not good quality. Also, very thin.
Although this rug is pretty to look at, it has a very slick surface that is a hazard to walk on. If I had known before I bought it, I certainly wouldn't have.

reviews.title: Very DISAPPOINTED
reviews.review_text: The rug is beautiful to look at and the texture was great. However the top separated from the foam cushion within two days. AND IT SHED ALL OVER THE ROOM !!! So unfortunately I had to return it.
The problem is not the rug the problem is I ordered 2 rugs of the same...they sent me two different rugs

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.review_text: I love this rug, and so do my dogs. Feels good on bare feet and it's not too fluffy, good thickness on the padding. Doesn't slide.
It' just didn't open right , and it was full of humps and very wrinkle. And no Refund yet to be seen over 8 weeks.

reviews.title: best carpet ever
reviews.review_text: the softest carpet I've ever felt in my life.. this carpet is better than I even expected it to be. I would buy it a thousand times over!!!
Thus rug is very soft to the touch, and the pad is suprisingly cushiony. Theonly complaint I have is the color was too yellow .
I'm returning it although nice product it has a very yellow overtone in the color. Need something more beige
my package arrived on time and was left right where i asked, the product is amazing and i love it! it makes my living room so much more comfortable

These carpets are so soft and nice. We love them…I ordered nine of these in various sizes. Our Great Pyrenees absolutely loves them, she rolls around on them all the time. Would recommend. Our robot vacuums them with no problems.

reviews.title: Colour does not match at all
reviews.review_text: Be careful ! The colour shown in the photo does not at all match the original rug colour! The colour in reality is a shocking pink, darker and more like cotton candy's colour. I had a surprise when opened the package. Need to return it.
This rug is so soft. It is ideal for child's room. They would be so comfy to play on it. It looks beautiful in my room. I got the dark gray one and it goes perfectly with my headboard
This rug seems well made, and it is soft, fluffy and pleasant to walk on. my cat quite enjoys it, and i occasionally lie down on the rug with him. all the stars, and i would recommend!

reviews.title: like sitting on a cloud
reviews.review_text: This is so soft and fluffy. I am using over my cement basement floor and i feel like i am walking on a cloud. i have only had it a day but it looks like its great quality.
this rug looks exactly like the picture it's like a buttery brown and so soft it's vacuum sealed and folded very well packed I like it would recommend thank you Rita

reviews.title: Price👍, Size👍, Texture👍, Color😔
reviews.review_text: I love everything about this rug; price, size and texture, the only problem is the color is more yellow than the cream color I expected. It does however look less yellow once it has expanded out of the packaging.

reviews.title: Soft %26 Fluffy
reviews.review_text: Really impressed with the quality of this item for the price. It is nice and fluffy. Stays put, doesn't slide around. The color was more of a cream than a yellow which was perfect. Would like to grab another for my bedroom.

reviews.title: Gave us the wrong color
reviews.review_text: Good quality but they did not give us the right color, we previously purchased a light gray rug from the same seller and this one is a much darkwr shade of gray

reviews.title: Not properly cut and won't lay flat
reviews.review_text: Save your money. The rug was not cut properly and had waves and bunch areas. I allowed it to sit for hours to see if it would flatten out but it wouldn't. Not worth the hassle to save some money on a rug.
so soft, the pad underneath so comfortable, love the packaging as well, the first time i didn't have to worry about corners coming up or rolling under.

reviews.title: Walking on a fluffy cloud
reviews.review_text: Loved it didn't disappoint so nice and the perfect size chose to put it in living room. Great buy for the value. Would order again. Super soft and big my family loves it.
This rug is soft and cozy. I have about 3 weeks with is and not hasn't shed, seems like good quality it will last. Using it in my bedroom, great choice.

reviews.title: Yes and no
reviews.review_text: I would recommend if you don't have dogs (pets) the look and felt good but it held everything like dog bones or any small object the brought in or played with hard to vacuum
The dark grey rug would not lay down flat because of the way it was shipped folded tightly in plastic. I tried to steam the back and laid it out for over 48 hours and nothing worked. Took it back.
I liked the quality of the rug, it was fluffy and soft. I didn't like the color. I ordered the color, light brown but it had to much yellow in it.

reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
reviews.review_text: Honestly really love this rug… the padding gives it a nice extra squish, the color is great, the shag is nice quality, our dogs and toddler love it. All around a great snag for the sale price and would buy again!

reviews.title: Great for the price
reviews.review_text: Love the rug ESPECIALLY for the price. I couldn't see myself paying $200 for a large area rug so took a shot on this one. Super soft and cushioned. Sheds slightly but overall worth the price.
SUPER SOFT!! easily puffed into size nearly immediately. took forever to place furniture because I couldn't stop laying on it.definetly recommend for play area
i love this rug but if you have animals im not sure it will hold up to that. Definitely for just appearance purposes only its starts to matt a little after a while but its so soft
This is a very nice rug. Very soft. The memory foam is nice and squishy lol. Not sure how well it would hold up in a high traffic area but so far I am very pleased.

OMG its so so soft. I can wash it in a big machine at the laundry mat. Its very flexible. my cats love to slide on it. I only got it to protect my hardwood floors from getting scratches but wow Im glad I picked this.

reviews.title: SLIPPERY
reviews.review_text: The rug looks great and is truly very soft BUT it is very slippery. Walk on it with shoes or barefoot and you slip and slide. From a safety perspective, I cannot recommend it. It is not worth an injury or broken bone.
It is so comfortable and fluffy. It look and feel like high quality material. It doesn't shed and that's what I was worried about. I would definitely recommend this product to family and friends.

reviews.title: Economical and beautiful
reviews.review_text: We ordered two rugs. One was perfect. The second one the color didn't work, but we reordered and we cried the replacement promptly. Return of the second one was easy. Live this product
it was shipped vaccum paced, opened easily and is soft and comfortable to the touch ,only took a xouple of hours to flatten out and look great in our living room!!! very good pad too!!!

reviews.title: Amazing Soft Rug!
reviews.review_text: Exactly as described and very soft… very satisfied with this product being that I chose to do this route instead of paying workers to install carpet in my small room. I'd recommend this rug.
it's hard to clean I really didn't know that It couldn't be wet clean Now I'm so deeply disappointed that I brought it. Truly a total waste of money. I'm throwing it out.

reviews.title: Carpet
reviews.review_text: I love this rug... It's the right color. It's soft and fluffy. Nice sizes. Only thing was wrong with the rug is the smell. But I sprayed it and helped.

reviews.title: Good if you don't have messy toddlers
reviews.review_text: I love this carpet so fluffy and the foam makes it more comfortable the only downside it cannot handle vacuuming at all and with my toddler the crumbs that fall in it is a pain to get it out if u can even get to it

reviews.title: Soft rug
reviews.review_text: I like this type rug, once its out and settles in it is really soft. WHAT I Don't like is the way it's shrink wrapped, it holds the smell of the material in and take a few days of a good cross breeze to get it out.

reviews.title: a steal
reviews.review_text: I wish it was wrapped up like a normal rug, but honestly for 50 bucks this thing is a steal. it is so worth getting, for the size and how soft it is. I love it. hate that it has to settle to get the creases out. but would def recommend this item.

reviews.title: Love this rug!
reviews.review_text: I got the rug on sale for an area for my son to play on, the memory foam between the layers really helped. We had to get another mat to go on top but the rug really helped and I really like it for the half off price I got it for!

reviews.title: Happy….
reviews.review_text: Needs a big room, feels so good ! Not formal, but everyone who sees it really likes it. It's gray, but has a slight blue tint. Shouldn't be used in a room where tiny things can be dropped in the shag though. I'm happy with it….

reviews.title: Great price great product
reviews.review_text: Great price for a great product. Very lightweight. Should be easy to toss in the wash. The picture online makes the rug look like a cream color but it is a light yellow.
this rug is sooooo soft and comfy, looking at it online made me hesitant on buying it at first and I just took a chance and WOW it's absolutely amazing. The price is definitely not bad either .

the fluff was nice however the backing and top of rug weren't cut evenly. big lump in middle of rug. wouldn't recommend. I was hoping it would lay flat because I did like the fluff. the color was supposed to be light gray. looked more light blue.

reviews.title: Silky soft %26 plush!
reviews.review_text: Shipped very compact in airtight packaging. Once opened it came out easy to arrange in the room. Rug is a beautiful color and silky soft. I love walking barefoot on it. Great for any room! Going to order another for the living room.
Very pretty rug. It does shed some, but is comfortable to walk on. I was disappointed that it is such a very bright pink. I didn't expect that so it clashes with the other pinks in my bedroom.
This is a soft, fuzzy little bedroom rug. My fault…I didn't pay close enough attention to description. It just wasn't what I wanted and expected but great for another purpose.

reviews.title: Hard to maintain. Cheap quality.
reviews.review_text: This rug is very hard to maintain. It collects a ton of crumbs that can't vacuum out easily, as it has burned up two vacuums. The top part separates from the padding underneath. The vacuum just wants to eat it because of that.

reviews.title: Recommended for everyone!
reviews.review_text: This rug is soft and comes in great colors. I ordered it in pink and absolutely love its bright, a really great value, and makes my the space come together with the decor so well.

reviews.title: Amazing Shag Rug
reviews.review_text: This shag rug is the perfect rug for any bedroom. It feels amazing to step out on and keeps the floor warm. I've got so many compliments on it and did let people and family know where I bought. Once again thank you Walmart.
I like the rug but color wasn't right it was suppose to be caramel but was more orange, plus shag rug is not good for living room will get dirty fast over all I liked the rug
This is not like your typical carpet. I like it for what I'm using it for in my studio house. Not recommended for a high traffic area. Could be a thicker.

reviews.title: I love this rug!
reviews.review_text: I love am so happy with the rug! It's so pretty and looks great with my sofa. It has a cushion to it when you walk in it. Super easy to vacuum. My pup got to the living room and peed on my rug. To my suprise it did not soak in to the rug. I cleaned it right up! It's big and comfy. Fills up my space perfectly.

reviews.title: Great product, especially for the price!
reviews.review_text: I was pleasantly surprised as to how nice and soft and cushy this carpet is because of the price. It was well worth it and I bought another one because of it. The biggest thing that I liked about it as well is that it's light To move around the floor easily.

reviews.title: Don't eat the yellow snow
reviews.review_text: I love this rug. I have it in grey and it's so soft and comfortable and holds up well. I have to say I don't really like the colors in any of these. The gray is a blue gray, which you don't really realize until it shows up at your house. I just ordered the light yellow, and it looked like a cream color in the pictures but then when it arrived, and I put it next to my cream furniture is this gross yellow color like snow that's been peed on by all the neighborhood dogs. This rug is so comfortable. I just wish they made it in better more neutral colors.

reviews.title: Pretty hard to maintain
reviews.review_text: The rug starts out nice it's soft and has a cushy feel to it. However, it is very hard to clean and maintain. You can't vacuum it because it gets sucked up in the vacuum. It's hard to sweep it out because it's so deep so if you just wanna use it and then throw it away, it might be something to be used for, but I've tried to care for mine and now I regret having to clean house cause it's so hard to maintain this rug.

reviews.title: Won't lay flat weeks after purchasing
reviews.review_text: It's tough to put a do not recommend on this item. Had previously purchased 2 area rugs (different color and sizes of this same brand and style) so I was very hopeful when this one arrived. After multiple weeks, it still will not lay flat, ripples in the areas that it was folded. I don't know if it was folded too tightly and for too long that it stretched permanently this way. I have placed heavy totes on the area that won't settle and it's helped slightly. My previous purchases were perfect right out of the packaging. This is a very disappointing $80 spent.

reviews.title: Cheap But Unusable
reviews.review_text: This rug will not lay flat due to the sides not being the same size. Its a tripping hazzard as the rug gaps from the floor in some spots close to 6 inches with no way to make it lay flat. the rug is very soft but also think with little too no padding work some spots having more padding than others. I dioxide for the price i could make it work if there were issues but the rug is unusable due to the design flaw causing the extreme gapping. In addition, since this is sold by a third party, I'm having a hard time returning the item.

reviews.title: Snug Rug
reviews.review_text: It's safe to say I'd buy again This is my second time buying this rug I purchased the pink one and the grey one they are large which is what i was looking for and soft They make good bedroom rugs The grey one had a weird smell at first to me but it quickly faded away once out the plastic The pink one was thicker to me than the grey one It lays flat and only thing is the shaggy carpet hairs can take more work to clean so dont drop anything on them My kids love rolling around on them

reviews.title: Works in Toddler Playroom but would not buy again
reviews.review_text: My son was here when opend and we both just laughed. Although I bought for Family Room he immediately said, "Want me to put in the playroom?" This is about the quality of a very, very thin bath mat. It is not far from me calling it a blanket. I will say the "Plush" fabric is soft and I like it in my toddler age grandson's playroom but be aware, very very very little padding. I added foam padding underneath. I would not buy again.

reviews.title: Doesn't stay in place on tile floor
reviews.review_text: This rug is very soft, so we love that. It will not stay in place though. We used rug tape and rug stick'em triangles, none of which worked to keep it from being moved around the floor from people or animals. The bottom just tore, so now we have holes in the liner, very disappointing.

The worst thing thevrug caused allergic reaction to me and my pets. I was getting hives and my cats and dog were scratching like mad. it was a nice-looking shag rug, but you couldn't vacuum it as the shag knotted around crumbs and debris fallen onto carpet.

reviews.title: Very soft and fluffy
reviews.review_text: This rug is so so soft. Sadly it's hard to keep as fluffy over time, especially if you spill something and need to clean it. It took a long time to flatten out and still likes to bunch up at a fold line . I wasn't expecting amazing but am pleased with the quality vs. price and size .Color very close to advertised picture.

while this rug is indeed extremely soft and shaggy, it is very poor quality when it comes to shape and settlement. We've had this rug since September 2024 now and it has yet to fall flat. Still, there are bumps showing throughout the rug, which i can only describe as "rolled up towels" placed under the rug. when trodden on they settle but only to pop up elsewhere. We kept the rug because primarily, it's an underbed rug. I would not recommend this rug if you plan on using it in the center of the room.

It's a very nice rug for the price we paid. We got it when it was on sale for close to $50 and definitely worth it. It's very soft and has a little bit of cushion to it as well that makes it quite nice to walk on. Came packed up very small so needed to be rolled out and allowed to sit for about a day. Overall a very nice rug

reviews.title: Beautiful living room rug
reviews.review_text: I'm very satisfied overall with this purchase. It's exactly as expected; beautiful, soft and fluffy, yet durable and able to withstand the foot traffic of the living room. I purchased a light grey so it will fit any changes of decor. I've purchased various rugs on Amazon before, and this is the first one I've actually wanted to write a review encouraging others to check it out.

I was very surprised when I opened the box to find my 8x10 rug folded and vacuum packed! But it's lightweight and was very easy for me to put down. I just fluffed it out like a blanket onto the floor. It's very soft and the color is exactly what I wanted. The creases are gone and it stays right where I put it. That's important when my cat goes zooming across the room. I'd buy it again.

reviews.title: Do NOT buy
reviews.review_text: I don't know how this received so many 5 star reviews. This is extremely poor quality. First, the smell when it comes out of the vacuum seal bag is atrocious. Then when you get it all unrolled it isn't thick at all. It's like someone glued fur to a playpen mat. Lastly it sheds so badly. I bought this for my daughter's nursery and I would NEVER let her lay on this as badly as it sheds. If I can find a box big enough this is getting returned. So disappointed.

reviews.title: Buy it!!
reviews.review_text: I bought an 8x10 light pink rug on sale for my living room. It's SO soft. It matches the photo, soft baby pink. It's got a nice cusion to it. It came in a small vacuumed sealed bag and fluffed up well after a day. Easy to vaccume too. I don't have a rug pad under it and haven't noticed it sliding at all... but it's almost the size of the room so it can't really move hah! It didn't smell at all when I recieved it. And it DOESNT SHED?! Like zero fuzzies. I vaccumed it right away and ran my hepa on high just incase. As someone with allergies to everything it hasn't bothered me a bit. I love it so much I told my roommate and he bought one in black for his room. For the price I absolutely recommend this rug from this seller!!

reviews.title: Fair product
reviews.review_text: I would not call this a good product due to one primary reason. Almost every day a little of it wears out. May be that is the problem with fur based texture in carpets/rugs. Still I am gone a keep this as I am not a big fan of returning products bought from anywhere including Amazon, Walmart etc.

reviews.title: Pretty nice value area rug
reviews.review_text: I received my rug quickly and was surprised by how small the package was. The rug was vacuum packed/sealed in a pretty small bag. The backing of the rug is thin and pretty flimsy. The color was more blue than I expected but it works out alright in my room. I'm unsure how durable it will be…time will tell.

reviews.title: Soft and durable
reviews.review_text: I got this because my apartment is drafty and the floor is cold. This rug helps keep things warmer and my pets absolutely love laying on it. This rug is light weight enough to shake out by hand. It's nice and cushy. I will definitely buy another one soon.

reviews.title: Baby loves it, easy clean
reviews.review_text: I bought it because our six month old daughter was learning to crawl. She was rubbing her knees and elbows raw. With this rug she is soo much happier and loves to ply with it. This rug is so light weight and easy to clean or just shake out. One person could easily carry it and it can fold up so easy. My dog go sick on the rug and it was such an easy clean up and so is baby food when the baby flings her spoon. It also makes my living room look bigger and brighter. 12/10 recommended.

reviews.title: Thin Rug
reviews.review_text: Bought 8x10. Not thick. Looks more blue than grey. Comes in very small box (10” x 20”) so was very uneven at first. Did flatten quite a bit but still a tripping hazard on one end. I would return it but there is no way i could get it back in the box as was shrink wrapped. I paid half price and will only be used temporarily but would not buy again or recommend.

exceeded my expectations. i bought it for a quick last minute apartment staging. I was expecting sparse thin shag. Its quite the opposite. the color is beautiful. Its thick and full and good quality. I will definitely be using it in other stagings. Nice Job!

Comes vacuum packed. Undid for it to expand which did not happen. Looks like strips of fluff sewed together in different directions. Description sounds like it's a thick memory foam base, thicker than other carpets. Did not find that truthful. Did not shed but definitely not what I want. Looks cheap and not well made.

reviews.title: Super Soft and Comfortable
reviews.review_text: The rug material is super soft. The oadding isnnice, but i thought it would be slightly more, or I would have given it a 5 star. It was a bit stretched out in spots where it had been folded and took a few days to relax. I haven't vacuumed it yet and am a bit afraid too due to the length of the pile. All in all, I think it was worth the money.

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.review_text: I didn't expect much from this rug with how cheap it was, but I was disappointed with how bad it is. It does not lay flat, multiple ripples and bumps. This is not from how it was packaged, it is more like it is puckered, bunched up and rippled in multiple spots. It doesn't appear to be cut correctly, the edges aren't straight. The padding is also uneven, some spots extremely thin.

I really was impressed with this rug, I purchased when I opened it. It was easy. The texture of the rug was silky and soft, and all that I wanted the size was perfect for my bedroom. Thank you Walmart. With this rug, I purchased when I opened it. It was easy. The texture of the rug was silky and soft, and all that I wanted the size was perfect for my bedroom. Thank you Walmart.

reviews.title: Best rug I ever purchased
reviews.review_text: When I got the rug. This rug was different. It wasnt as bulky as the other rugs I bought. 72 hrs for the rug to complete on being flat. The rug was flat in just a few minutes. The quality is way better than others. This particular seller has my business from here. You want rug that lays excellent in just a few minutes. The color is exquisite and I just love this rug. The information is accurate. I am beyond happy from this purchade,and you will to.

reviews.title: Go for it!
reviews.review_text: I recently purchased the 8x10 ft gray fluffy rug, and it has exceeded my expectations! The rug is incredibly soft and plush, making it perfect for lounging or adding a cozy touch to any room. The gray color is a versatile neutral that complements a variety of decor styles, from modern to traditional. The size is ideal for a larger living room or bedroom, covering ample space without feeling overwhelming. It's also well-made, with no shedding or loose threads, which was a concern I had with fluffy rugs in the past. The non-slip backing is a bonus, keeping it securely in place even on hardwood floors. Overall, this rug is a great blend of comfort, quality, and style. If you're looking to add a soft, luxurious feel to your home, I highly recommend it!

reviews.title: Soft %26 Beautiful
reviews.review_text: It is do soft. Great product for the cost. We got the grey 8X10. It's in our living area and gets a good amount of foot traffic. We don't stress over trying to keep it spotless. We change rugs with our mood or season. Will definitely buy this brand again!

its duper thin and light so i thought the cushioning would be useless but it's actually very effective. The pile is very long so it's easy for crumbs or small pieces of paper to become a permanent part of the rug, but it's light enough to shake out over the deck every now and then. Soft, plush, perfect for my daughters' room.

reviews.title: Get the rug!
reviews.review_text: This rug is super soft and has a nice padded underneath. We absolutely love it! The only negative comment I have is it's almost too slippery to walk on when you first put it down because it's unbelievably soft. Overall we love it and will purchase again

reviews.title: i didnt like
reviews.review_text: it felt Like i was walking on doll hair and was a little slipery
Layed out very well everyone that comes over gets the (shoes off please.)
Honestly way better then expected and I want another
cover's like it is supposed to. very nice be only better 8f had more colors
Not quality. TEars up easy when cleaning, which I found difficult.

reviews.title: Great for toddlers room
reviews.review_text: Purchased for my granddaughters room. She absolutely loves it. So soft and does not slide around.
Very soft and plush. i love this carpet. Lovely gray color.
It's so soft and it looks great, the price was amazing! Awesome price for a large carpet, love it
Awesome! Got it for the babies to crawl on. Great grip for them. It also feels so soft and spongy
This the best throw rug I have purchased in a long time I hope it lasts forever
im sending it back. It's not laying on the floor flat, and it's like wet dog hair..

reviews.title: Very plush look!
reviews.review_text: this rug looks very nice and walking on it is comfortable!
love these carpets they're so soft but you need Velcro to hold them down cuz it's hard to vacuum
Great quality. My 6 year old daughter loves how it feels
The rug itself was okay it just didn't fit my living room floor..
I love this rug. This is my 2nd time purchasing one
Its really worth buying. I just love the look, the quality, the softness and comfort.
It's been 3 days and can't get the bubbles out. Keep tripping on it
it was more furry than shag like. shed like a cat. not what I was looking for.

reviews.title: Buyyyy it!
reviews.review_text: Bigger than expected, good thick material and soft!

reviews.title: Uncomfortable
reviews.review_text: Bought this for my granddaughter. You can't even push a vacuum on it !
I bought it for sewing room but it was too big so I gifted it to my daughter, loved it.😁
Nice soft rug bought for living room and it looks great it completes our living room

reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL RUG
reviews.review_text: I LOVE MY RUG VERY SOFT AND BEAUTIFUL

reviews.title: Easy Process
reviews.review_text: Very easy to order and product is perfect!
It cannot be cleaned. Damp cloth only. Much bigger than the size ordered.
Rug is very soft and smooth. No creases from being boxed up. Great find
i got orange whennit looked like brown on line and i asked for brown and it needs to.be more thick
The softness to my feet,it makes my living room look new
vary outstanding, carpet from walmart, every thing i buy from there store is not that good products , but this carpet is, i give it a 10

reviews.title: So far, so good. It's big. Fluffy. And very, very
reviews.review_text: So far, so good. It's big. Fluffy. And very, very pink! I'll update if it like, falls apart when vacuumed or something crazy like that.
The rug is soft but we like it because it warms the floor which is cold. we can roll %26 remove in warm months.
I absolutely love this rug… So far so good , I just received it a couple days ago … I'll update if any problems…
These rugs won't stick to the ground and they are very hard to vacuum. We bought 3 of them and are very disappointed.
Took a minute to get used to it as it is kinda slippy when you 1st walk on it, now love it, it is soft, easy to vacumn and soft to sit on

reviews.title: Not too happy…
reviews.review_text: I ordered a light gray %26 got dk gray. The rug is slippery %26 nap is thin. Will have to purchase another rug….
Exactly what I wanted and Iam so happy for the price. The whole family loves the upgrades I have made

reviews.title: Wish they didn't like it so much!
reviews.review_text: Added to the otherwise plain and uninteresting room. The kids love to lay on it…hate this. I know I will have to order another..
i love how soft and comfortable this rug was the kids took turns making "carpet angels" lol they love how soft it is
Beautiful rug, really compliments my sofa, and other furniture. Very soft for my granddaughter to crawl and play on.
One corner bubbles. Had to hide it under the couch very very soft but sheds vacuum brush tangles in the shag VERY VERY thin

reviews.title: perfect
reviews.review_text: this is my 2md rug. i thought i wanted something different. but after seeing prices. i went with this one again
Great Quality!! Rug is very soft and a pretty decent size ! Most definitely recommend purchasing this lovely rug!!! Will be ordering again!!
Bought this rug for my living room and it makes the space so much better. The size is bigger than I thought which is great for the price.

reviews.title: Great room rub for teenagers
reviews.review_text: It is not a thick rug but it still feels good under your feet. I did not realize how big the rug was. My daughter absolutely loves it in her room.

reviews.title: Best purchase this year!
reviews.review_text: This is the perfect rug for my designated space. It is lightweight and flexible. The color is true to the discription. I would buy this again.
I was very impressed with the overall cushion of the carpet, the softness, and quality for the value.

reviews.title: shag rug
reviews.review_text: This is a nice nice cozy rug to enjoy sitting back watching tv.. Couldn't ask for a better rug.. The rug is awesome some what speechless

reviews.title: Cannot vacuum
reviews.review_text: It's a nice comfy carpet but it's impossible to Vacuum. Everything sticks in the fur and if you get crumbs on it it feels like they never come out.
it looks a bit different from picture, its alot more shiny in person.
I like it still have to let it stretch out other than that it's nice
It's inexpensive but nice and soft. when it gets disgusting, we just buy another.
Is soft, good quality and the best parts don't move out the place.
i did not order this color. i ordered dark gray and got a camel color instead
Absolutely love the way it feels perfect. Fits very happy.
My grandkids and I love love our new rug and the price was absolutely amazing.

reviews.title: not flat
reviews.review_text: it days it will take 72h to lay flat but it appears that it was cut uneven.

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.review_text: It is so soft, I love rubbing my feet on it. It was perfect for my bedroom!

reviews.title: black shag rug
reviews.review_text: this was a gift for my daughter, she loves it.

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.review_text: Very beautiful very good quality. I absolutely love it.

reviews.title: The rug is greater than how it shows on the pictur
reviews.review_text: The rug is great bt the color is darker grey than what shows on the picture

reviews.title: Good Rug
reviews.review_text: The rug is so soft and comfortable to walk on. I recommend it!
it is thin than expected. Also, irregular in shape.

reviews.title: Poor smell
reviews.review_text: I love it but it smells terrible. Like literally terrible! Idek how to get the smell out but everything else is great
This is a very nice looking rug. Unfortunately the shag itself is very slippery, therefore as a senior I cannot use it.
This was a great buy! Needed for a guest bedroom, %26 it's made the room very comfortable %26 inviting.
Thinner than I hoped it would be and has one spot that is wrinkled and not laying flat. Its as good as it get of the cheap price.

reviews.title: Not worth it
reviews.review_text: Does not lay out flat. It is small at 1/4 and is buckled up. We. Tried And tried to stretch it out but it doesn't lay flat
the rug is not thick like depicted in photos, it is slippery to walk on. very nice size and great for the price

reviews.title: Not good
reviews.review_text: Very hard to vacuum. You have to vacuum all four directions, then, do it again. Takes way too long. I'm about ready to throw it in the trash.
I'm so happy with my purchase. This carpet is so beautiful, soft and cozy. And for the price, it was more than worth it.
Im not very happy with the color its supposed to be light grey and ended up with a dark blue gray love the rug very soft
9x12 very good quality rug. My daughter loves it. We are going to order a rug padding for extra comfort to sit on.

reviews.title: Like walking on a cloud
reviews.review_text: Well constructed fug. Also the softest rug I've ever had. Whole family loves it. Considering purchasing another one.

reviews.title: So So Soft
reviews.review_text: Bought as temporary carpet while building home. It's extremely soft and pretty. It is a very affordable option.
at I wasn't sure if I was going to like it, because it was so soft. I thought it was like faux fur, but I absolutely love it

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.review_text: I was not satisfied i couldn't get it to lay right,I got rid of it.It was money waisted.Was not happy at all

reviews.title: Great rug
reviews.review_text: I love this rug! It is so soft. Everybody ends up laying on the rug instead of sitting on the couch LOL

reviews.title: bad rug
reviews.review_text: rug doesnt lay flat. almost as though spots got wet and shrunk up in areas causing ripples. wouldnt recommend.

reviews.title: very happy
reviews.review_text: very soft, actual size, could use a layer of catpet cushion under it but not needed, i just like exra soft carpet

reviews.title: Can't go wrong on this purchase.
reviews.review_text: This rug is amazing. Light weight, feels so soft, and great price. Love this rug and so does everyone who comes in contact with it.

reviews.title: Rug is not what it appears to be.
reviews.review_text: It's not as thick as I was told, it didn't level out within the time frame I was told and the dimensions are off.
Posting after months of usage. It is perfect for my living room, the feel is exceptional would recommend others to close your eyes and buy this one!

reviews.title: not up to standard
reviews.review_text: i dont like that this carpet is hard to clean stuff get stuck in it, and not even a vaccum can get them out of the furr
Didn't expand out it was vacuum pack and it didn't expand had it down for a week some spot were cushion but most of it wasn't
it's a good shag rug for the price, it looks excellent in my bedroom, don't know if i would pit in a high traffic are though
Nice and Soft!!!! Covered more of the living room than I thought it would. My kids love laying on it cause it's extra thick!!

reviews.title: Not my style
reviews.review_text: Tacky is the word that comes to mind because it looks way different in person. Too long of a shag for me.

reviews.title: Great for my daughters room
reviews.review_text: This is very nice shade of pink. It looks perfect in my daughter's room. Very soft on the feet. For the price def worth it.
i did not receive the color I ordered. the kids loved how soft it is, and it didn't look bad. do we kept it.
it's hard to vacuum because it wants to suck up into my vacuum cleaner so I'm really upset about it and it's really not soft soft comfortable
It's soft and pretty but it's a greenish gray and not that you can see in the photo - it's like very dark
Was exactly what I thought it would be! Feels great on my feet, no odor and was easy to unroll. Great value for the money in my opinion.

reviews.title: Size is acceptable. thickness not bad. but crooked
reviews.review_text: Is good size but even after a month the rug is all crooked due to the vacuum packaging. If you can handle that then should be fine.
rugs came vacuum packed with a foam type packing. after 10 days the creases would not smooth out . product returned.

reviews.title: SO MUCH BETTER THAN DESCRIBED
reviews.review_text: This "Rug" I actually thought about getting another one and use it as a blanket. Just put the fuzzy side down.

reviews.title: Area rugs
reviews.review_text: The rugs are pretty and soft on your feet. We had to stick them under the bed legs as they are slippery on the wood floor.

reviews.title: Worth it.
reviews.review_text: I purchased the light grey 8x10z it's darker hi hi in then pictured. Overall , it's very soft no shedding. The built in padding was a plus. Iioii

reviews.title: Soft and fluffy
reviews.review_text: Over the moon with this purchase. Got it for my library and have no regrets. It's incredibly soft and has nice cushion as well.
Soft, thick and plush to walk on. Color is just right for my living room and chairs. I just love it!!
I was shocked at how big the rug was. It's so soft. I just ordered a 2nd one for my bedroom! Definitely buy it. (I have a 8x10)
iI will be taking it back for a refund didn't like the rug felt more like a blanket and was made wrong didn't align with the opposite side
I never received the item and they refused to refund me even though it was delivered to the wrong address.

reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL NEFOSO SHAG 9' x 12' RUG!!!
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this Nefoso Shag Rug. It's very pretty, soft and fluffy. I'm glad I purchased it.

reviews.title: Somewhat disappointed!
reviews.review_text: Cheap quality. Very thin, not much backing, would not lay flat, like it's been stretched out of shape. I do like the size. Will probably go ahead and use if I can get it to lay flat.

reviews.title: delivery was awful
reviews.review_text: driver left all of my packages downstairs in the backyard not even at a door I specifically ask for them to be left at my front door it's a terrible rainy day they left them inside a back gate in the backyard in a puddle.

reviews.title: Great size
reviews.review_text: Love the carpet, but it is very slick,,got it for our new great grandbaby, who is just now walking , we wanted to cover out stained floors,,not sure which is better slick shag or slippery floor

reviews.title: Huge rug small price.
reviews.review_text: I wanted a cheap rug that would cover most of my floor. While looking at rugs the big ones all we're at leave $100 bucks. This rug had the size I needed and the price was perfect. I'd recommend it to anyone.

reviews.title: Soft and comfortable
reviews.review_text: This Nefoso shag rug is so soft that it makes it comfortable to watch TV while relaxing on it. The shag is soft but not too long. There is padding under it. The dog likes it too. I recommend this rug. I am happy with this purchase.

reviews.title: Comfortable
reviews.review_text: Good value, very soft, and comfortable. I do however, find it hard to vacuum. Ive had it a few weeks. There is no shedding which i was concerned about.
I like the fact that it's super soft. I thought it was going to be really flimsy because of the packaging but it's really durable once you get the wrinkles out.

reviews.title: Soft and light weight, but..
reviews.review_text: Looks great in the living room, very soft and lightweight rug. The reason for 3 stars is because you have to be VERY CAREFULLY walking on it as it's quite slippery and an accident waiting to happen, so we'll be returning it.

they sent me the wrong size. it was bigger so i wasn't upset for that. when i layed it out, the padding is missing in multiple spots and it won't lay flat. i tried everything but where the paint is missing the carpet is stretched.

reviews.title: On the fence?!? Just GET IT!!!
reviews.review_text: This rug is absolutely perfect for our daughter's room. It's so fluffy and soft. Even our German Shepherd. Can't stay away from it now!! If you're thinking about it, or just on the fence, just do it!!!!

My boyfriend always spills on it. The liquid never seems to seep through. Easy to clean. Maybe I should keep the rug and get rid of the boy child who always spills then complains about spilling. Good rug.

reviews.title: pretty but not practable
reviews.review_text: it cannot be cleaned, it is more of a bedroom shag, soft and slippery. cannot use water to clean. cannot washer clean it. nice for bedroom not livingroom,

This is well worth the $, backing is not extra thick, it was all as advertised, I am getting another. Fastly delivetred, and good quality , correct size, and color. It was a good deal at that price, none beter that is unused. Texas BluesMan

reviews.title: Shaggy!
reviews.review_text: The carpet didn't smell, shed or feel bad. It's soft and one thing that's a drawback is that if this EVER gets stained… you basically have to throw it away.
A very nice rug. I got it on sale for the holidays. It covers a lot of space. It's very soft, and the color was spot on. Will be purchasing another soon.

The advertisement said nice thick Shaggy carpet well. I thought it would be a carpet and here come. Rolling out was only about a 1/2 inch thick. Is there a little box? How's your little disappointment?

reviews.title: Excellent Bargain Surprise
reviews.review_text: All positive reviews are accurate, Surprisingly silky, just right length to the shag, no shreddingbeautiful medium grey, feels wonderful to bare feet, looks expensive. Very highly recommended
The carpet is completely off. Some of the seems aren't matching up at all and making the carpet look crooked. All of the fur fabric is just blowing all over the place.

reviews.title: i would not recommend to anyone with children.
reviews.review_text: if anything gets spilled on this rug, it is ruined. you cannot clean it at all. if you attempt to dab it dry, it just goes to the pad on the bottom and the rug doesn't look like it has anything on it.

reviews.title: Love it.
reviews.review_text: Carpet is beautiful very soft and fluffy and the perfect size for my living room. Was expecting it to be a little cheaper material but it's definitely not!!

reviews.title: Nice for the price.
reviews.review_text: I spent awhile debating on buying this based on the mixed reviews. Couple months of debating, I finally chose to buy it. It was worth the sale price of $57. It's soft and comfy. Not really that thick though. But for the price, it was worth it.

Excellent rug! The softest feel, very silky. Easy to vacuum, and I don't say that lightly, I vacuum frequently- year round shedding German shepherd in the house. We love this rug and the price makes it even that much better.

reviews.title: Great but slippery
reviews.review_text: The rug is super soft and keeps my room so much warmer instead of just hard wood floors. The only down side is that it can be slippery in socks! But I love it!

Never received item and Walmart did NOT help with the process knowing I never received it even when they saw a picture proving it was not delivered to my home. It pays to be a Walmart prime member. NOT!

reviews.title: More fluff than fiber
reviews.review_text: It's not like shag carpet, it's more like a fuzzy blanket. I'm keeping it though. It's very very soft and feels nice to do yoga on. The price for a 9'x12' was great.

reviews.title: Pink
reviews.review_text: This rug is absolutely huge . It's way bigger than I thought would be . But that's a plus . Super cute pink color , soft to walk on . Just put it down , so it hasn't laid down fully yet. I would recommend .
Love it. Only reason it wasnt 5 stars is that it was a lot thinner than I thought it would be. had to leave carpet pad and old rug down under it to get desired thickness
It is a little softer than what I would love it, almost slippery. But it is so soft. Definitely better in a room than a living room for due the texture. But I think it does look great.
It brings out every other thing that I have in my living room also %26 besides my grandson loves the way it feels! He lies down on it everyday when he comes by me!!! Thanks again. ❤️ 😊

reviews.title: Shag area rug.
reviews.review_text: The area rug is very soft to the touch, and has a soft non skid backing. It is great for the bedroom, living room or a playroom. I am using it in a playroom.

reviews.title: Better than expected!!
reviews.review_text: This carpet was even better than we thought it would be! It's super soft %26 fluffy, extra large, and is a perfect addition to the decor in our living space! It feels so good on our feet and very comfortable to relax on! Would definitely buy again!

reviews.title: Nice rug
reviews.review_text: I am very happy with this rug. I got it to keep my Grandson off of the cold floor when he plays with Legos. The dogs like lying on it too. I have vacuumed it with a stick vac and it didn't shed. It is a very good value for the price.

reviews.title: Great for the money
reviews.review_text: Bought to try to replace carpet in kids bedrooms since I cannot afford new carpet at the moment. Kids love it, it does look good. Just a waiting game to see how it holds up.
the carpet came folded in a small roll. the area the was subject to no being covered is noticeabley dirty and thiner then the rest of the carpet. making it seem old and dingy in that 2ft by 3ft area

reviews.title: livingroom area rug
reviews.review_text: I love this rug, at first it didn't lay flat from the packaging but within a couple of hours it did, I love the texture under my feet, it feels very luxurious and comfy
The shedding never ends.. it collects all over your clothes . You can walk across it once and you socks are covered. It's all over my house and I'm about to throw it out..
Great area rug, the corners don't curl up and the rug stays in place!
It was soft just like the reviews very happy a big throw rug
This rug is perfect for if you have little ones crawling and walking!

reviews.title: Very Doft
reviews.review_text: Very soft, and very large. 2 /8x10's covered my living room perfect. Love how doft they are.
Holds smells and just does not hold up well. Not worth the money.
It is good quality it was in packaging that was easy to manage, looks great in my room
I love that it is soft and how it feels under my toes lol.
It was slippery to walk on with socks, very scarce and cushion was super thin
The most softest most beautiful rug ever. I absolutely love it

reviews.title: Great rug
reviews.review_text: Way bigger than expected and extra padding made it a very comfortable rug.

reviews.title: Nice Carpet
reviews.review_text: Very nice carpet looks great in front of Couch
Bought this rug for my daughter and she loves it. It's SUPER plush.
Beautiful right for my daughter's room! Soft and lightweight.
